BIOS

I know all this.  The issue is strictly driver support.
As far as Linux support is concerned, DVD drives speak ATAPI just like CD-ROM drives, and they use the same drivers
(assuming it's PATA or SATA; if it's SCSI, naturally it speaks SCSI)
